class.name: InputEventAction
class.description: Contains a generic action which can be targeted from several type of inputs. Actions can be created from the project settings menu [code]Project > Project Settings > Input Map[/code]. See [method Node._input].

members.member: The action's name. Actions are accessed via this [String].
If [code]true[/code] the action's state is pressed. If [code]false[/code] the action's state is released.
